segments.text: Excuse me . We're leaving today . I'd like to pay our bills now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . By the way , I'd like to tell you that the check-out time is 12
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you used any hotel services this morning or had breakfast at the hotel dining room , Mr . Green ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my friend and I just had breakfast at the dining room , but we didn't use any services .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the charge for the days you shared the room with your friend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The total for the eight days is five hundred sixty yuan .
segments.speaker: S2
